info.title: API Reference
info.description:
# Introduction
 You can manage items in the Bold Reports On-Premise using the REST API.

tags.name: Items
tags.description: To retrieve a list of items, or retrieve, create, modify, and delete a particular item in the Bold Reports On-Premise, use the corresponding endpoints below.

post.description: Users who have access to the report, can copy the report by providing respective report details in the request body.

parameters.name: apiCopyReport
parameters.description: Details of the report passed will be copied.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

403.description: Do not have permission to set report will be copied as public

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

409.description: Report will be copied name already exists

IsPublic.description: Specify true to set the item as a public.

IsCopyDatasource.description: Copy the datasource of the report based on this value

IsCopyDataset.description: Copy the dataset of the report based on this value

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

PublishedItemId.description: Returns the published report item id

Version.description: Returns the version number of the report

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.
